oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tamme's (or possibly !nanni's) aunt was killed by elephants at night. His mother told his father who killed a person. Tamme's mother cried and the father kills another person the next day. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The death of an aunt
